location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 666/46 'Persian Gulf: size of food parcels which may be admitted into UK'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding food parcels being sent from the Persian Gulf to the UK, and restrictions on their size, content and frequency. The correspondents are: Political Resident, Persian Gulf; India Office.
